thread.title: Football hooligans brawl on Berlin streets, up to 40 arrested (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Football hooligans brawl on Berlin streets, up to 40 arrested (VIDEO)

author: RT
title: Football hooligans brawl on Berlin streets, up to 40 arrested (VIDEO)
text:
Football hooligans brawl on Berlin streets, up to 40 arrested (VIDEO) Published time: 26 Feb, 2017 01:05 Get short URL Â© footballfanarchive / YouTube A huge brawl erupted on the streets of Berlin near the Moabit district on Saturday ahead of the football match between fierce rivals Hertha BSC and Eintracht Frankfurt. 
At roughly 1pm local time a crowd of approximately 60 people engaged in the violence, a police spokesperson told rbb 24. Some media reports citing witnesses suggested that up to 200 people took part in the fighting. Dutzende Festnahmen in Moabit
